images.copyright: French Quarter, New Orleans, Louisiana (© f11photo/Getty Images)
images.title: Happy Mardi Gras!
images.caption: New Orleans for Mardi Gras
images.desc: Welcome to Mardi Gras, the festivity celebrated before the start of Lent in Roman Catholic countries around the world and in many parts of the US. Mardi Gras is especially big here in New Orleans, where celebrations date back to sometime in the mid-18th century.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
